title: Mummy
desc:
Post 1928
- If a player targets you with any effect, their identity slots all become **Mummy** (1928) of this color.
- If you target a player with a single-target card effect their identity slots all become **Mummy** (1928) of this color.
- If <:void:1119855990263775283>, cards can't be played on it.
- Based on @R.O.B..
